summary.para: Serves as a base for classes that present commands.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.CanExecute

summary.para: Determines whether the command can execute in its current state.

member.returns: true if the command can execute; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.CommandSourceType

summary.para: Gets or sets the type of the object which invokes the command.

member.value: A enumeration value, specifying the object type.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.CreateDefaultCommandUIState

summary.para: Creates an object defining the command state for the current command.

member.returns: An interface that defines the command state.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.Description

summary.para: Gets the text description of a command.

member.value: A string containing the command's description.

summary.para: Executes the command on the current command target.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.ForceExecute(DevExpress.Utils.Commands.ICommandUIState)

summary.para: Performs a command action, regardless of a command state.

member.param: An interface defining the command state.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.HideDisabled

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the object to which the command is attached is hidden, if the command is disabled.

member.value: true to hide the object with a disabled command; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.Image

summary.para: Gets an image associated with the command.

member.value: A object representing the associated image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.LargeImage

summary.para: Gets a larger image associated with the command.

member.value: A object representing the associated image.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.MenuCaption

summary.para: Gets the menu caption associated with the current command.

member.value: A string representing the text of the menu item.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Utils.Commands.Command.UpdateUIState(DevExpress.Utils.Commands.ICommandUIState)

summary.para: Updates the command state.

member.param: An interface defining the state of a command.

summary.para: Lists implemented spell checker operations.
Replaces a word in the text with the user input, and adds the replacement to the custom dictionary.
Stops the spell check operation, resets the checking strategy and closes the spelling form.
Replaces the current word in the text being checked with the suggested word.
Replaces all occurences of the current word in the text being checked with the suggested word.
This enumeration member is intended for internal use only.
Deletes the current word from the text.
Disregards the current word and proceeds to the next one.
Disregards the current word and all its occurences in the text.
This enumeration member is intended for internal use only.
Invokes the spelling options form. After closing the form, re-checks the text with the new spelling options, starting with the last checked word.
Forces the spell checker to check the last checked word again.
Replaces the current word in the text being checked with the suggested word. For internal use.
Disregards the current word and proceeds to the next one. For internal use.
Cancels the effect of the last operation, restoring the text to its previous state.
Lists available operation modes of the spell checker.

Starts spell check when you finish typing the word or moves the cursor after changing it.This operation mode underlines the misspelled word and allows you to select a suggestion from the context menu, invoked by right-clicking the word.
Starts spell check and invokes the spelling form for making corrections.
Represents a method that will handle the event.

summary.para: Lists values which specify the validity of a condition (indicates whether the condition is true or false).
The value is determined by a control's current setting. The default value is automatically set for a control if an end-user doesn't specify a value.
Corresponds to a Boolean value of false.
Corresponds to a Boolean value of true.
Represents a method that will handle the event.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the CustomSummaryEventArgs class.

member.param: An integer value, identifying the processed row by its handle. This value is assigned to the property.
An object, representing the custom calculated summary value. This value is assigned to the property.
An object, representing the processed field value. This value is assigned to the property.
An integer value, identifying the group row whose child data rows are involved in summary calculation. This value is assigned to the property.
A enumeration value, identifying the current calculation stage. This value is assigned to the property.
An object, representing the summary item whose value is being calculated. This value is assigned to the property.
An integer value indicating the nested group level of the processed row. This value is assigned to the property.

member.value: An object, representing the processed field value.

member.returns: An object that represents the specified field value.

member.value: An integer value representing the zero-based nested level of the processed group.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.GroupRowHandle

summary.para: Gets the handle of a group row whose child data rows are involved in summary calculation.

member.value: An integer value that specifies the group row's handle. 0 when calculating a total summary value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.IsGroupSummary

summary.para: Gets whether a group summary value is being calculated.

member.value: true if a group summary value is being calculated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.IsTotalSummary

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.RowHandle

summary.para: Gets the processed row's handle.

member.value: An integer value that identifies the processed data row by its handle.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.SummaryProcess

summary.para: Gets a value indicating the current calculation stage.

member.value: A enumeration value, identifying the current calculation stage.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.TotalValue

summary.para: Gets or sets the total or group summary value.

member.value: An object representing the total or group summary value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Data.CustomSummaryEventArgs.TotalValueReady

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the Calculation stage of the custom summary calculation process should be skipped.

member.value: true to skip the Calculation stage of the custom summary calculation process; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Contains values that specify the data type and binding mode of columns.
Indicates that the column is unbound and it contains Boolean values (the type).
Indicates that the column is bound to a field in the control's underlying data source. The type of data this column contains is determined by the bound field.
Indicates that the column is unbound and it contains date/time values (the type).
Indicates that the column is unbound and it contains decimal values (the type).
Indicates that the column is unbound and it contains integer values (the type).
Indicates that the column is unbound and it contains values of any type. A editor is assigned for the in-place editing of such a column.
Indicates that the column is unbound, and it contains string values (the type).
